sourcesContent:
/** This Status code file is used to keep all type of HTTP Status Codes in a single place.
      and this helps us in asserting the response status codes * */

exports.StatusCode = {
  OK: 200,
  CREATED: 201,
  ACCEPTED: 202,
  NON_AUTHORATIVE_INFORMATION: 203,
  NO_CONTENT: 204,
  RESET_CONTENT: 205,
  PARTIAL_CONTENT: 206,
  MULTI_STATUS: 207,
  ALREADY_REPORTED: 208,
  IM_USED: 226,
  MULTIPLE_CHOICES: 300,
  MOVED_PERMANTENTLY: 301,
  FOUND: 302,
  SEE_OTHER: 303,
  NOT_MODIFIED: 304,
  USEP_ROXY: 305,
  SWITCH_PROXY: 306,
  TEMPORARY_REDIRECT: 307,
  PERMANENT_REDIRECT: 308,
  BAD_REQUEST: 400,
  UNAUTHORIZED: 401,
  PAYMENT_REQUIRED: 402,
  FORBIDDEN: 403,
  NOT_FOUND: 404,
  METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED: 405,
  NOT_ACCEPTABLE: 406,
  CONFLICT: 409,
  INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: 500,
  NOT_IMPLEMENTED: 501,
  BAD_GATEWAY: 502,
  SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE: 503,
  GATEWAY_TIMEOUT: 504
};

/** This urlMapper file is used to keep all your Api-url end points in a single place. * */

exports.UrlMapper = {
  LOGIN: '/user/login',
  GETUSER: '/user/get',
  CREATE: '/user/create/',
  EDITUSER: '/user/edit',
  DELETEUSER: '/user/delete',
  CREATEPRODUCT: '/product/create',
  GETPRODUCT: '/product/get',
  EDITPRODUCT: '/product/edit',
  DELETEPRODUCT: '/product/delete',
  CREDITUSER: '/transaction/deposit',
  BUYPRODUCT: '/transaction/buy',
  RESETDEPOSIT: '/transaction/reset',

};
